etymology.description: Depicts a drum with its stand and sticks arranged on top, representing a musical instrument.
etymology.interpretation: 壴(壴) (zhù, "drum") visually depicts a traditional Chinese drum, with its structure and accessories, making the character intuitively understandable as representing a drum.

examples.chinese: 古人用壴打节奏(古人用壴打節奏)。
examples.english: Ancient people used the drum to beat the rhythm.

examples.chinese: 夜晚沙场上(夜晚沙場上)，战鼓和壴同时响起(戰鼓和壴同時響起)。
examples.pinyin: Yèwǎn shāchǎng shàng, zhàngǔ hé zhù tóngshí xiǎngqǐ.
examples.english: On the battlefield at night, both the war drum and the drum sounded simultaneously.
